head.title: 1 Killed and 4 Hurt In Newark Shootings

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New Jersey

hedline.hl1: 1 Killed and 4 Hurt In Newark Shootings

abstract.p: One person is killed and four others wounded when two gunman open fire on car parked near intersection in Newark, NJ, in what appears to be drug deal; names of victims are not released (S)

block.p: One man was killed and four other people were wounded last night when two gunmen opened fire on a car parked near an intersection in Newark, the police and witnesses said.

In what appeared to be a drug deal setup, two young men carrying guns rode on mountain bicycles up to a late-model green Honda Civic about 9 p.m., said two witnesses who declined to give their names for fear of retribution. The car, which had five people in it, was parked on Fourth Avenue near Roseville Avenue.
One man was killed and four other people were wounded last night when two gunmen opened fire on a car parked near an intersection in Newark, the police and witnesses said.

In what appeared to be a drug deal setup, two young men carrying guns rode on mountain bicycles up to a late-model green Honda Civic about 9 p.m., said two witnesses who declined to give their names for fear of retribution. The car, which had five people in it, was parked on Fourth Avenue near Roseville Avenue.

The two men opened fire, and the people in the car scrambled to get out, the witnesses said. One man fell face first to the sidewalk with a bullet wound to the head. Last night, after the shootings, he lay on the ground. The gunmen rode off on their bikes, the witnesses said.

The other four victims were taken to University Hospital and were in stable condition last night, a police official said. The police declined to identify the dead man pending notification of his family, and did not identify the other victims.
The police were still looking for the gunmen last night. Search dogs were brought to the scene after midnight. About 20 onlookers stood gazing at the bullet-riddled car.
The shooting took place in a middle-class neighborhood of low-slung row houses and apartment buildings.
